snippet: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic chose to be philosophical after losing in the second round for the first time in three years on Wednesday, calling it "proof that nobody is unbeatable" after surrendering his Monte Carlo Masters title in a shock 6-4, 2-6,...
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic chose to be philosophical after losing in the second round for the first time in three years on Wednesday, calling it "proof that nobody is unbeatable" after surrendering his Monte Carlo Masters title in a shock 6-4, 2-6, 6-4 loss to 55th-ranked Jiri Vesely.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic Loses to Vesely in 2nd Round of Monte Carlo Masters
headline.main: Djokovic Loses to Vesely in 2nd Round of Monte Carlo Masters
